metadata.title: CVE-2020-14410 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer) through 2.0.12 has a heap-based buffer over-read in Blit_3or4_to_3or4__inversed_rgb in video/SDL_blit_N.c via a crafted .BMP file.

notes.note: mdeslaur> same commit as CVE-2020-14409 for libsdl1.2, this was fixed by CVE-2019-7637

criterions.comment: libsdl2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.14+dfsg2-3').
